name: Local Hero (Next Branch Games)
description:
Save your town from Coronavirus and starvation. Supply food and medical supplies, implement the best policies to stop the spread and keep people alive! 

You can also try out COVID-19 TAXI which is a two-player competitive version of this game with slightly different rules. 

Use ARROW KEYS to move/drive. The blue marks on the map need food. The red marks need medical supplies. 

Implement the right policies to make your job easier and reduce further spread.
